Package index

All functions

calculate_c_index()
Calculates Harrell C-Index for a model
calculate_predictions(<cox>)
Calculates the predictions for a Cox model
calculate_predictions(<logreg>)
Calculates the predictions for a logistic regression model
calculate_predictions()
Calculate the predictions for a model
calculate_predictions_recalibrated_type_1(<cox>)
Calculates the type 1 recalibrated predictions
calculate_predictions_recalibrated_type_1(<logreg>)
Calculates the type 1 recalibrated predictions for a logistic regression model.
calculate_predictions_recalibrated_type_1()
Calculates the type 1 recalibration predictions for a model.
calculate_predictions_recalibrated_type_2(<cox>)
Calculates the type 2 recalibrated predictions for a Cox model
calculate_predictions_recalibrated_type_2(<logreg>)
Calculates the type 2 recalibrated predictions for a logistic regression model
calculate_predictions_recalibrated_type_2()
Calculates the type 2 recalibration predictions for a model.
framingham
An example dataset from the Framingham study
get_calibration_plot()
Generates the calibration plot
get_calibration_plot_data()
Generates the data needed for the calibration plot
get_c_index_forestplot()
Generates a forestplot to visualize C-Index of different models
get_error_message_calculate()
Logic for checkin all the needed parameters for calculate_ functions are correct
get_error_message_calculate_recalibrated()
generates the error messages for the recalibrated predictions
get_recalibrate_params_type_2_cox()
Obtains the \(S_0(t)\) and \(\beta_{overall}\) parameters for recalibration
get_recalibrate_param_type_1_cox()
Obtain the \(\alpha\) value for the recalibration.
mv_model_cox()
Creates a cox model.
mv_model_logreg()
Creates a logistic regression model
print(<MiceExtVal>)
A generic function to print the MiceExtVal model
